snippet: In a 32-page civil rights lawsuit, the Justice Department contended that Mr. Arpaio’s campaign against illegal immigration had resulted in a “pattern or practice of unlawful discrimination” aimed at Latinos.
lead_paragraph: In a 32-page civil rights lawsuit, the Justice Department contended that Mr. Arpaio’s campaign against illegal immigration had resulted in a “pattern or practice of unlawful discrimination” aimed at Latinos.

headline.main: United States vs. Joseph M. Arpaio
